1: <pb/><t>Alek yuj diosalil bay Jehová yujtol watx' is c'ul Cham; a is camc'ulal Cham ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
2: <pb/><t>Jalokab ayon israel on ti', tol a is camc'ulal Jehová ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
3: <t>Yalokab eb sacerdote, tol a is camc'ulal Jehová ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
4: <t>Jalokab ayon ay yelapnok Jehová yul co sat ti', tol a is camc'ulal Cham ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
5: <pb/><t>Ayin wal oc yin in yailal, max wawten Jehová cax max quin is yabeni, cax max in colchaj el yuj.</t>
6: <t>Ayic' Jehová wetok. C'am chin xiw yuj tzet ok in yut eb wet animail.</t>
7: <t>Ayic' Jehová wetok, yujtol in Colomal yayji, xan ok wil yayc'ay eb c'am chin ocheni.</t>
8: <t>Yelxac'al watx' tol chi jaoc Jehová yipok co c'ul, yintak pax eb jet animail.</t>
9: <t>Yelxac'al watx' tol chi jaoc Cham yipok co c'ul yintak pax eb yajaw.</t>
10: <pb/><t>Maxc'al oymoj masanil nacionlak win, palta yuj yipal Jehová xan max ayc'ay eb wuj.</t>
11: <t>Maxc'al oc oyan eb winlak, palta yuj yipal Cham max ayc'ay eb wuj.</t>
12: <t>Maxc'al oc oyan eb winlak axca wal no noal cab, axa yowal eb max tancan el axca k'ak' ayoc yin takin q'uix. Yuj yipal Jehová max ayc'ay eb wuj.</t>
13: <t>Max in is tencantok eb yin yaxc'ayinakil, yet watx' chin ayc'ay yuj eb yaloni; palta max jay Cham yuj in ul coloni.</t>
14: <t>Chin bitni bay Jehová. A Cham chi aon oc wip, a Cham in Colomal yayji.</t>
15: <pb/><t>A bay yatut eb anima ikem, ay bit yet tzalojc'ulal, yujtol max ayc'ay owal yuj eb. C'ayubtak max yun yipalil Jehová.</t>
16: <t>A yipalil Cham max ak'on ayc'ayok. A yipalil tu' c'ayubtak max yunej.</t>
17: <t>Man ok in camok, palta ok in iquisbok ec'ok, yet watx' ok walil tzet max yun Cham.</t>
18: <t>Miman tz'um max wik yuj Cham, palta maj yal c'ul max in camxac'al.</t>
19: <pb/><t>Jakek puertail templo; chi yochej in c'ul chi toj wal yuj diosalil bay Cham.</t>
20: <pb/><t>A ton jun ti' is puertail bay chon oc satak Jehová; a bay tu' ok octok eb ikem.</t>
21: <pb/><t>Chi wal yuj diosalil ayach Jehová yuj max quin a tak'wej, yujtol in Colomal ach.</t>
22: <t>A ch'en ch'en max yintaknej el eb watx'nem na, a ch'en max oc yin jolom txiquin na.</t>
23: <t>A jun ti' max yun Jehová, cax chi c'ayaj co c'ul yuj.</t>
24: <t>A ton jun c'ual ti' max tz'unchajcan yuj Jehová, xan chon tzaloj tinani', chi elxac'al lenaj chi jila'.</t>
25: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, ocan t'anan jin on, cax colon elok, watx'okab chi yun co cancan oj.</t>
26: <pb/><t>Al-layokab watx' k'anej bay Cham chekbiltek yuj Jehová. Chi jal watx' k'anej ayex mac ex chex jay bay templo Jehová ti'.</t>
27: <t>A Jehová Dios toni, a Cham chi tzektanen co be. Chaek k'in, cax quetzektek no xajanbal masantac'al bay txiquinlak altar.</t>
28: <pb/><t>Chi wal yuj diosalil ayach Mamin, yujtol in Diosal ach, cax chi wal watx' k'anej yuj a mimanbilal.</t>
29: <t>Al-layokab yuj diosalil bay Jehová yujtol watx' is c'ul Cham; a is camc'ulal Cham ayc'al yin tojbalk'inal.</t>
